Package de.lessvoid.nifty.layout

Class BoxConstraints

java.lang.Object
de.lessvoid.nifty.layout.BoxConstraints
public class BoxConstraints extends Object
The BoxConstraints class represent a rectangular area on the screen. It has a position (x,y) as well as height and width attributes.
